properties.entry: SELECT REG_NO , MEM_NAME , CL_NAME , TEACH_DATE , REG_DATE , START_TIME || '-' || END_TIME "SCH_TIME" , TO_CHAR(REG_PRICE, '999,999,999') || '원' "REG_PRICE" , REG_COUNT || '명' "REG_COUNT" , REG_STA , REG_CAL FROM REGISTER JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) JOIN CLASS C USING(CL_NO) JOIN SCHEDULE USING(SCH_NO) WHERE C.MEM_NO = ? AND DECODE(REG_STA, '0', '승인전', '1', '승인완료', '2', '승인완료', '4', '승인반려') LIKE ? ORDER BY REG_NO DESC

SELECT REG_NO , MEM_NAME , CL_NAME , TEACH_DATE , REG_DATE , START_TIME || '-' || END_TIME "SCH_TIME" , TO_CHAR(REG_PRICE, '999,999,999') || '원' "REG_PRICE" , REG_COUNT || '명' "REG_COUNT" , REG_STA , REG_CAL FROM REGISTER JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) JOIN CLASS C USING(CL_NO) JOIN SCHEDULE USING(SCH_NO) WHERE C.MEM_NO = ? AND REG_STA = ? ORDER BY REG_NO DESC

SELECT REG_NO , MEM_NAME , CL_NAME , TEACH_DATE , REG_DATE , START_TIME || '-' || END_TIME "SCH_TIME" , TO_CHAR(REG_PRICE, '999,999,999') || '원' "REG_PRICE" , REG_STA FROM REGISTER JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) JOIN CLASS C USING(CL_NO) JOIN SCHEDULE USING(SCH_NO) WHERE C.MEM_NO = ? AND REG_STA IN(1,2) ORDER BY REG_NO DESC

SELECT REG_NO , MEM_NAME , CL_NAME , TEACH_DATE , REG_DATE , START_TIME || '-' || END_TIME "SCH_TIME" , TO_CHAR(REG_PRICE, '999,999,999') || '원' "REG_PRICE" , REG_COUNT || '명' "REG_COUNT" , MEM_PHONE , NVL(MEM_EMAIL, '없음') "MEM_EMAIL" FROM REGISTER JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) JOIN CLASS C USING(CL_NO) JOIN SCHEDULE USING(SCH_NO) WHERE REG_NO = ?
UPDATE REGISTER SET REG_STA = ? WHERE REG_NO = ?

SELECT CL_NO , CL_NAME , TT_NAME , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('20230127', 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" (DY)') "TEACH_DATE" , START_TIME || ' - ' || END_TIME "TEACH_TIME" , TO_CHAR(CL_PRICE, '999,999,999') || '원' "CL_PRICE" , ? "PEOPLE" , CL_PRICE * ? "PRICE" , CL_THUMB FROM CLASS JOIN SCHEDULE USING(CL_NO) JOIN TUTOR USING(MEM_NO) WHERE CL_NO = ? AND SCH_NO = ?
SELECT MEM_NO , NVL(MEM_EMAIL, '이메일 없음') "MEM_EMAIL" , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_NAME = ?, MEM_EMAIL = ?, MEM_PHONE = ? WHERE MEM_NO = ?
INSERT INTO REGISTER ( REG_NO , MEM_NO , CL_NO , TEACH_DATE , SCH_NO , REG_PAY , REG_PRICE , REG_COUNT ) VALUES ( SEQ_REGNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT TEACH_DATE , REG_NO , REG_DATE , REG_PAY , TO_CHAR(REG_PRICE, '999,999,999') || '원' "REG_PRICE" , REG_COUNT , REG_STA , CL_THUMB , C.CL_NAME "CL_NAME" , S.START_TIME "START_TIME" , D.DISTR_NAME "DISTR_NAME" , T.TT_NAME "TT_NAME" FROM REGISTER R LEFT OUTER JOIN CLASS C ON C.CL_NO = R.CL_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN DISTRICT D ON D.DISTR_CODE = C.DISTR_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TUTOR T ON T.MEM_NO = C.MEM_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN SCHEDULE S ON S.SCH_NO = R.SCH_NO WHERE R.MEM_NO= ? AND REG_STA NOT IN (3,4) ORDER BY REG_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM REGISTER WHERE REG_STA NOT IN (3,4) AND MEM_NO = ?
